title: Manage a Warehouse Safety Inspection
description: A warehouse manager needs to conduct a routine safety inspection.

tasks.description: Use a digital checklist to inspect the warehouse for potential safety hazards (e.g., blocked aisles, unsafe stacking).
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager completes the inspection checklist on a tablet.
The inspection identifies a pallet that is stacked too high.

tasks.description: Create a corrective action task for the identified violation and assign it to a warehouse worker.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a task for a worker to restack the pallet safely.
